title: Constant "Attempting to Reconnect" and Lag spikes.
body:
Ever since the start of the new season I've been experiencing huge lag spikes and lots of "Attempting to Reconnects". 
Normally my ping is around 35-40 and FPS 60 and these values don't change even when I get the lag or DC.
I play other online game that involve real time events and get no lag or DC with those, plus only just got better internet.
Just wondering if it's caused by the new season/update/Oceanic Week?
Is anyone else experiencing this?
I would like to play Ranked, but can't even enjoy a full Normal Game without Lag and DC ruining it.

replies.body:
Been happening to me a lot lately. Cant pin down an exact time it started but at least since the OCE week patch hit.

Near Brisbane, with Dodo.

I am getting the exact same thing happening to me since the last patch came in. I was worried it was my internet connection or PC but it seems like there have been others over the past few days who are having the same issues. Hopefully it will get fixed soon!

Hey guys,

Thanks for the reports - Can you tell me what location you are in and ISP you are with?

EDIT: it would also be great if you could run the [network diagnostic tool](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/tools/network-logs) and submit the results!

-Mindstar

I'm at Lismore Heights and Telstra ADSL 2+

EDIT: Uploaded the tests results. Experiencing heavy rain here at the moment which might have affected the results.
I don't think you should be posting that here, LELOLELOELOLLOEALELAOEOL. It contains personal information. Just send the logs in the usual way.
Usual way takes 2-3days to reach, this way is much quicker if the sender gets lcuky.

With the added benefit of a convicted murderer being able to find out where you live and come to kill you!

:D
That is a scary thought lol.
Extreme, yes. But better safe than dead, as I always say.
Didn't realise it contained my name. Can you please also delete my name from your comment. Ta.

So I sent in the *network diagnostic tool* and replied with my area and ISP and I haven't had any reply so far. The lag spikes and A2R's are still as prevalent as ever. People on both the enemy team and ally team experience the lag spike or A2R at the same time, so it is NOT on OUR end. 

Just as an indicator at how things should be done, I had trouble with the Free To Play game "Defiance" where I couldn't buy something and an error kept popping up. The GM located the problem, fixed it and personally replied back to me *within a DAY*!  With RIOT we're treated like Centrelink customers "Please use the phones and someone might get back to you". At least reply to me via email saying what the problem might be with possible solutions. 

I know OCE/Australia is kinda the forgotten part of the world also known as Narnia, but I assume we are still a large portion of your bank roll. 

I also had another recent problem where as soon as I was in the loading screen pregame, somehow LOL would make my computer lose all the wireless Networks. I would have to completely restart my computer and internet router to fix it. I repaired my LOL and that seems to have fixed the problem for now. Has anyone else had this weird issue?

same problem here. been going on for over a month now :(
game is basically unplayable like this...
Im not getting any lag but the disconnect from chat happens on daily basis.
It's started happening to me too. Constantly "Attempting to Reconnect" after massive lag during games, even in Co-op vs AI... {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Lag usually happens around this time when the new game type "Snow down" is available. The lag should go away when this special game type goes away. haha.

Due I have even pLanned to switch ISP from Flip to Spark but as I have realised the problem is with RIOT and not the ISP's itself. So SAD THEY BLAME THEM ON THE isp DOING THE POOR JOB. SUCK BLAME GAME, MUCH WOW. :(

Basically RIOT blamed Flip but they internet worked fine for other games. Flip took the blame and so I switched to my friends Telstra internet, NOW RITO blames Telstra for the lagg, Telstra took the blame. I again switched to a new provider SPARK. I CAN PREDICT THE FUTURE, RITO IS GOING TO BLAME SPARK TOO. I know Spark will take the blame. 

Why don't RiOT REALISE  people play other high demanding games like new COD, Destiny and don't have any reconnection issues. While only LeAGUE have so much lags, disconnections, dramas, depression, rage at internet service providers. Every update break the game that took time to make it working properly and the cycle repeats over and over again. I can predict another patch in 1 week will break everything that took time for us players to get to working properly.

So what I am understanding is every single ISP Cannot play Rito game because LOL is more high demanding in requirements than COD and Destiny? If that is not true, Rito has to focus on providing few high quality updates instead of messing up the ones that was working properly before.

cant tell if its my net or not,
ping spikes from 16-400 ping throughout my games
not noticeable on downloads tho :O
{{item:3070}}
